version_description:
- Improved view for txt files
- Fixed loss of 'Normal' style in doc files
- Support Chinese input in doc files
- Fixed crashes with OneDrive accounts
- Various bug fixes

- Improved view for txt files
- Fixed loss of 'Normal' style in doc files
- Support Chinese input in doc files
- Fixed crashes with OneDrive accounts
- Various bug fixes

- iOS 10 fixes
- Allow users to recover files missing after iOS 10 update
- Prevent files from being misplaced after iOS 10 update
- Include a setting to view hidden folders (use this to recover files)

- iOS 10 fixes
- Allow users to recover files missing after iOS 10 update
